title: Fast Track Istio - NDC Melbourne 2020
description: Explore the features of Istio by strategically deploying a simple microservices application to a Kubernetes cluster.

courses.title: 1. Installing Istio
courses.description: Learn to install Istio on Kubernetes cluster.

courses.title: 2. Deploying Services
courses.description: Learn to deploy existing and new services to Istio.

courses.title: 3. All on Board
courses.description: Deploy the services of the Book Club application to the mesh.

courses.title: 4. Patterns: Versioning, Fault Injection, & Canary Releases
courses.description: Learn to implement microservices traffic management patterns.

courses.title: 5. Patterns: Resilience & Mirroring
courses.description: Learn to implement some more microservices traffic management patterns.

courses.title: 6. Service Discovery
courses.description: Bring services outside the cluster to the service mesh.

courses.title: 7. Security
courses.description: Secure the services running on the Istio service mesh.

courses.title: 8. Observability
courses.description: Monitor services on your mesh in real time with visualization tools.
